nodes.id: 中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法
en: Public Security Administration Punishments Law of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一部法律，主要规管违反治安管理但尚不构成刑事处罚的行为。其前身为《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚条例》。
description.en: A law of the People's Republic of China that primarily regulates acts that violate public security administration but do not constitute criminal offenses. Its predecessor was the 'Regulations on Administrative Penalties for Public Security of the People's Republic of China'.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门，负责起草《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法》。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of nationwide public security work, which drafted the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law of the People's Republic of China'.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家行政机关，是《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法》的提案方。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, which proposed the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law of the People's Republic of China'.

nodes.id: 第十届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the 10th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十届全国人民代表大会的常设机关，于2005年8月28日通过了《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法》。
description.en: The permanent body of the 10th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, which passed the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law of the People's Republic of China' on August 28, 2005.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国主席，于2005年8月28日签署主席令公布《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法》。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as President of the People's Republic of China and signed the presidential decree to promulgate the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law of the People's Republic of China' on August 28, 2005.

en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The head of state position of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国治安管理处罚条例

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国治安管理处罚条例
en: Regulations on Administrative Penalties for Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法》的前身，最初于1957年通过，后经多次修订。
description.en: The predecessor to the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law of the People's Republic of China', originally passed in 1957 and subsequently revised multiple times.

en: 8th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第八次全国代表大会，会议提出健全民主法制，加快了《治安管理处罚条例》的立法进度。
description.en: The 8th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, which proposed to strengthen the democratic legal system, accelerating the legislative process of the 'Regulations on Administrative Penalties for Public Security'.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the 1st National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一届全国人民代表大会的常设机关，于1957年10月22日通过了《治安管理处罚条例》。
description.en: The permanent body of the 1st National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, which passed the 'Regulations on Administrative Penalties for Public Security' on October 22, 1957.

description.zh-cn: 中国法学家，清华大学法学院教授。她对《治安管理处罚法》2023年修订草案中关于“伤害中华民族感情”的条款提出了公开批评。
description.en: Chinese legal scholar and professor at Tsinghua University School of Law. She publicly criticized the clauses regarding 'hurting the feelings of the Chinese nation' in the 2023 draft amendment to the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law'.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学下属的法学院，劳东燕在此任教。
description.en: The law school of Tsinghua University, where Lao Dongyan is a professor.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者，《环球时报》前主编。他对《治安管理处罚法》2023年修订草案中关于“伤害中华民族感情”的条款提出批评，认为应进行细化。
description.en: Chinese journalist and former editor-in-chief of the Global Times. He criticized the clause about 'hurting the feelings of the Chinese nation' in the 2023 draft amendment to the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law', suggesting it should be more specific.

description.zh-cn: 中国法学家，华东政法大学宪法学教授。他对《治安管理处罚法》2023年修订草案提出了批评。
description.en: Chinese legal scholar and professor of constitutional law at East China University of Political Science and Law. He criticized the 2023 draft amendment to the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law'.

description.zh-cn: 香港大学法律学院教授，他对《治安管理处罚法》2023年修订草案提出了批评。
description.en: Professor at the Faculty of Law, University of Hong Kong, who criticized the 2023 draft amendment to the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政法大学教授，她对《治安管理处罚法》2023年修订草案提出了批评。
description.en: Professor at China University of Political Science and Law, who criticized the 2023 draft amendment to the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政法大学教授，她对《治安管理处罚法》2023年修订草案中将“侮辱”、“谩骂”视为阻碍执行职务的行为表示担忧。
description.en: Professor at China University of Political Science and Law, who expressed concern about classifying 'insult' and 'verbal abuse' as obstruction of duty in the 2023 draft amendment to the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law'.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人大常委会

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人大常委会
第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十四届全国人民代表大会的常设机关，审议并修订了《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法》。
description.en: The permanent body of the 14th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, which reviewed and amended the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law of the People's Republic of China'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任司法部部长，在第十四届全国人大常委会第五次会议上就《中华人民共和国治安管理处罚法（修订草案）》作了说明。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Minister of Justice, who explained the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law (Revised Draft)' at the fifth session of the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 一种法律概念，指国家面临或发生重大威胁时，政府可采取特殊措施的状态。《治安管理处罚法》第五十条规定了拒不执行紧急状态下命令的处罚，但在实践中其适用引发了争议。
description.en: A legal concept where a government can take special measures when the state faces a major threat. Article 50 of the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law' stipulates penalties for refusing to comply with orders under a state of emergency, but its application has been controversial in practice.

description.zh-cn: 全球性重大突发公共卫生事件。在此期间，中国地方政府曾引用《治安管理处罚法》中关于“紧急状态”的条款来实施疫情防控措施。
description.en: A major global public health emergency. During this period, local governments in China cited the 'state of emergency' clause in the 'Public Security Administration Punishments Law' to implement pandemic control measures.

description.en: During the COVID-19 pandemic, local governments cited Article 50 of the law regarding 'state of emergency' to punish violations of pandemic control measures without legally declaring a state of emergency, sparking controversy over the scope of the clause's application.
